setup.title: Ion Ka Setup
setup.subTitle: my.telegram.org/apps se API credentials praapt karen aur phorm bharen, yadi aapake paas 2fa saksham hai, to aapako apana paasavard bhee darj karana hoga.
setup.successInfo: Ion ko ab chalana chaahie. aap ise "ping" kamaand se check kar sakate hain
setup.greetings: Ion ko choose karne ke liye shookriya, {{name}}.

settings.contributorsInfo: In sabhi ko dil se shookriya

scope.all: Har ek chat me kaam karega
scope.groupAndChannel: Sift group aur channels me kaam karega

ping.name: Ping
ping.info: Yah modyool aapako yah jaanchane mein madad karega ki aapaka bot chal raha hai ya nahinà¥¤

config.displayLatencyInfo: Yadi aap jaanna chahte hai ki kitna der lga message ko edit hone me to ise enable karen

afk.name: AFK
afk.info: Ye modyool doosaron ko yah jaanane mein madad karata hai ki aap keebord se door hain

config.afkMessageInfo: Jab aap afk hon tab bhejane ke lie sandesh. aap apane sandesh mein variables bhee shaamil kar sakate hain, aur jaanen.

shortlink.name: Short Link
shortlink.info: Kisee bhee url ko chhote link karen
